snippet: Sahar Gul, a young Afghan woman who was tortured by her husband and in-laws for six months, is recovering at a shelter for abused women in Kabul.
abstract: Sahar Gul, a young Afghan woman who was tortured by her husband and in-laws for six months, is recovering at a shelter for abused women in Kabul.

headline.main: The Road Toward Recovery for Sahar Gul
